statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE LENGTH(contract_code) > 100;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(execution_logs) AS num_logs FROM smart_contracts WHERE num_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, JSONB_STRIP_NULLS(execution_logs) AS clean_logs FROM smart_contracts WHERE clean_logs IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM execution_logs WHERE execution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT contract_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM execution_logs GROUP BY contract_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM execution_logs WHERE execution_result LIKE '%success%' ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, execution_date FROM smart_contracts JOIN execution_logs ON smart_contracts.contract_id = execution_logs.contract_id WHERE execution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT contract_name, COUNT(*) AS execution_count FROM smart_contracts JOIN execution_logs ON smart_contracts.contract_id = execution_logs.contract_id GROUP BY contract_name HAVING execution_count > 2;

SELECT DISTINCT contract_name, COUNT(*) AS total_executions FROM smart_contracts LEFT JOIN execution_logs ON smart_contracts.contract_id = execution_logs.contract_id GROUP BY contract_name ORDER BY total_executions DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts_code;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts_code WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, contract_id, execution_date, execution_result FROM execution_logs ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts_code WHERE contract_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT action, timestamp, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts_code WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts_code WHERE contract_name LIKE '%contract%';
SELECT contract_id, MAX(execution_date) AS latest_execution_date FROM execution_logs GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_name, execution_result FROM smart_contracts_code JOIN execution_logs ON smart_contracts_code.contract_id = execution_logs.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_name, creation_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM contracts WHERE creation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM contracts ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM contracts WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contract_logs JOIN contracts ON contract_logs.contract_id = contracts.contract_id WHERE log_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT users.username, users.email, user_permissions.permission_type FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT contract_id, contract_name, creation_date FROM contracts JOIN contract_logs ON contracts.contract_id = contract_logs.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM contracts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_code, contract_name FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, executed_at FROM contracts WHERE executed_at IS NULL;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, executed_at FROM contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE '%agreement%';
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_name, created_at FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, executed_at FROM contracts WHERE executed_at IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.contract_name, cl.log_message, cl.log_timestamp FROM contracts c JOIN contract_logs cl ON c.contract_id = cl.contract_id;
SELECT u.username, ur.role FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id;
